Text.Language: Hiten nie~u,/ n~te peniwt e#y#u# n~dikeoc: abba Lazaroc pie~pickopoc: P[oic a~rih~mot nan m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the prayers: of our righteous father: Abba Lazarus the Bishop: O Lord grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
